attributes.action: Take actions to stop surpressing innocent  Pakistani students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the terror raids the spotlight has now turned on Pakistani students. The conservatives have called on the government to make urgent changes to security checks on visas for Pakistani students.

The Media is making out like all Pakistani students are a threat to Britain.

We have heard this crap before. Stop demonising Pakistani students!
